issue.title: [CF 845] Drag Menu -> 'Copy Icon Conditions/Events"
issue.body:
Just a simple request. When dragging an icon on top of another, add an option for 'Copy Icon Conditions' and/or 'Copy Icon Events'. Would be useful for no reason than to not make the same condition/event multiple times.


> Posted by CurseForge user Freeebo | Imported from CurseForge issue #845 | Raw

comments.body:
I like it. Will release this when I get a chance to test it when the PTR servers come back up in a few hours.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

If I could amend onto this, another useful thing similar to this would be when importing something from another profile, if when going down to the profile -> group -> icon, add another layer down for importing icon/event. Might be useful for some, I know I would have had use for that now and again.

But if not, the original change will be more than perfect.


> Posted by CurseForge user Freeebo

I would rather just keep icons as the lowest level of the import dialog. You could still just import an icon, right-click-drag to copy the conditions and events, and then get rid of the icon.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Done in r845
